GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to do sanity check on block address in f2fs_do_zero_range()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 7361c9f2bd6a8f0cbb41cdea9aff04765ff23f67. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: f2fs: fix to do sanity check on block address in f2fs_do_zero_range()
